price: 27. (Sulaymaan) wuxuu yidhi: Waanu eegi inaad run sheegi ama inaad ka mid tahay beenlowyada.
arabic: ۞ قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla sananẓuru aṣadaqta am kunta mina al-kādhibīna
